Load tidyverse

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Read in Our Data

```{r}
surveys <- read_csv("data-raw/surveys.csv")
```

# Follow Up Question

## Psych Package

```{r}
# install.packages("psych")
library("psych")
describe(surveys)
```

## Summary Tools Package
```{r}
# install.packages("summarytools")
library(summarytools)
dfSummary(surveys, style = "multiline", plain.ascii = FALSE)
```
## Hmisc Package
```{r}
# install.packages("Hmisc")
library(Hmisc)
describe(surveys)
```
